channel.title: What do I put for the animation in DATmaker for K'ril(Custom NPC)?
channel.description: Okay well I put together K'ril and I'll attack lower but when I'm in DATmaker what do I put for the animation at the bottom.

item.title: What do I put for the animation in DATmaker for K'ril(Custom NPC)?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Cannot be animated as simple as that lol.

Manually add the animation using skins and priorities using metasequoia.

Read full topic
